values.description: NE Seniors helps seniors living in NE Minneapolis, St. Anthony Village, Columbia Heights and New Brighton live independently with dignity in their homes.  Volunteers make it possible for NE Seniors to provide over 1,000 rides each year.  To keep seniors informed of services through a quarterly newsletter that reaches over 850 people.  To repond to over 150 inquiries per month on issues ranging from crime victim services to snow shoveling; home visitor programs to help caring for a pet.  NE Seniors works in partnership with many organizations to provide services.  Neighborhood Health Source outreach workers provide Medicare Part D consultations in our offices.  Lindquist & Vennum provides a free monthly legal clinic (individual consultations) for real estate related issues.  Little Brothers Friends of the Elderly provide visitors in the home and trains volunteers to become a friend. Adam Kaufman of Jensen, Sondrall & Persillin provides workshops on estate issues and health directives.  Local housing providers join with us to offer Senior Housing tours: Autumn Woods Apartments, The Kenzington of St. Anthony, Crestview, Catholic Eldercare, Chandler Place, Peter Nassef Maronite Home.  NE United Methodist provides free office space and is opening a senior coffeehouse on site.  Gustavus Adolphus Lutheran is sharing their bus.  Catholic Eldercare and Autumn Woods provide meeting space.  Many community and religious organizations provide financial support.  Together we make lives better for the seniors living in our neighborhood.
values.name: Northeast Senior Services, Icn.

values.description:
Our Southeastern Michigan based company is your number one go to source when you need any type of Internet Marketing done for your business.  We specialize in SEO (search engine optimization), SEM (search engine marketing), social media marketing, email marketing campaigns, website content development and marketing materials.  We can get your website into the top search results on Google, Yahoo & Bing at very reasonable prices!

Is your business on all the top social networking sites like Facebook, LInkedIn and Twitter?  Does your website have a blog?  Do you want to find ways to get maximum exposure for your website without drowning in the cost of Pay-Per-Click and AdWords advertising?  We are equipped with the secrets of the trade here at Internet Marketing Made Simple.

Located in Washtenaw County in Milan Michigan Internet Marketing Made Simple is owned and operated by Kimberly Kitson.  With over 15 years of small to medium sized business experience, along with training in the most up to date internet marketing techniques, she can increase traffic to your website with higher quality leads, in turn increasing your revenue.  Internet Marketing Made Simple is your hands down choice in Southeastern Michigan including Washtenaw, Livingston, Monroe, Wayne, Oakland, Macomb and Lenawee counties.  More specifically, serving but certainly not limited to, Ann Arbor, Milan, Dexter, Pinckney, Whitmore Lake, Chelsea, Monroe, Ypsilanti, Belleville, Canton, Plymouth and Brighton.
values.name: Internet Marketing Made Simple

values.description:
Richard is currently post-producing Keeping Rosy starring Maxine Peake (Silk) and Blake Harrison (The Inbetweeners). This film is the directorial debut of multi-award winning commercials director, Steve Reeves. 

Richard is currently delivering Jadoo, Amit Gupta’s second feature, starring Amara Karan and Harish Patel to US agency, Resolution for North America and The Works for international sales. Jadoo was the closing night film of the Culinary Cinema section of at this year’s Berlinale.

In 2011 he produced Resistance, based on the award-winning novel by Owen Sheers. The film was Amit Gupta’s debut and stars Andrea Riseborough (Brighton Rock, W.E.), Michael Sheen and Sharon Morgan, who won the Best Actress prize at this year’s BAFTA Cymru awards.

Richard produced the award-winning thriller Eden Lake. Written and directed by James Watkins (The Woman In Black), it stars Kelly Reilly (Flight), Michael Fassbender (Shame). Eden Lake won the Best Horror award at the Empire Film Awards.
 
Richard co-wrote and produced Stefan Schwartz’s award-winning Shooting Fish, starring Kate Beckinsale and Stuart Townsend. Richard then went on to produce Kirk Jones’ Waking Ned, gaining a nomination for a Producer’s Guild of America award and both Shooting Fish and Waking Ned are posting net profits. 

Richard has lectured at the National Film & Television School, European Film College, Screen Academy Wales, Southampton Solent University and on the Royal Holloway MA Screenwriting course.
values.name: Big Rich Films

values.description:
The Drift Record Shop has been occupying number ninety one high street in the Devon county town of Totnes since 1994, selling a collection of music that is indefinable in it’s collective genre, style or outlook. This we see as a good thing.
Drift Records. In our time we’ve even put out the occasional release as ‘Drift Records’. The label picked up glowing praise early on for it’s lo-fi folk, with albums by The R.G.Morrison, Thirty Pounds of Bone and Birdengine receiving national attention. Our first compilation ‘The Drift Collective’ gave the whole roster a showcase, highlighting (much as with the shops ethos) how Electronica, Folk, Indie and Americana can not only sit next to one another, 
Subsequent albums from Matt Eaton, Tandy Hard and Mary Hampton also won the label many plaudits and more importantly lots of new friends. We were very proud to work with Muddy Suzuki and Thomas White (on his first solo album outside of Electric Soft Parade and Brakes) and also Scotland’s Le Reno Amps, all three groups showing how far we’d moved from the ‘folk label’ Drift had been billed as.

Another little miracle courtesy of Devon via Brighton’s always excellent Drift Records - Time Out

Inventive, imaginative and different; long may they collect together - Record Collector

“Down at the roots of British folk, strange things continue to stir. Devon’s Drift label has a small but intriguing roster of young talents“ - The Observer
values.name: drift records

values.description:
Nigel French is a graphic designer, artist, photographer, author and teacher living in Brighton, UK. Author of InDesign Type and Photoshop Unmasked (both Adobe Press) he has also contributed more than 20 titles to the Lynda.com online training library.

Nigel has taught graphic design and design software for more than 15 years in the US and the UK to students from a wide range of backgrounds and ages, and covering all levels of experience. Concurrent with his design projects, Nigel travels nationally and internationally teaching InDesign, Photoshop, Illustrator, and Lightroom to a broad cross-section of the creative industries.
values.name: Nigel French Graphic Design

values.description:
Training Alliance Group is a UK coalition of full time practitioners and trainers leading the way in developing and delivering both corporate and personal development training courses in NLP, CBT and Hypnosis for individuals looking for excellence in personal development; while also offering some of the country's leading corporate development training programmes, including sales performance, effective presentation skills, business motivation, goal setting, stress management and general business development.

TAG's broad range of expertise has been built from over 35 years' experience in developing and delivering Hypnosis, NLP and CBT on a corporate and personal level, which is how we are able to train you in such a diverse range of skills.

What is important to you when looking for a personal or corporate development training provider?

~ Experience
~ Diversity
~ Options
~ Continuing Professional Development
~ Recognised professionally accredited awards
~ Location: personal development training in London, Milton Keynes, Brighton
~ Corporate development programmes delivered on-location to UK businesses

Typical Courses and Programmes:

Effective Presentation Skills
Effective Sales Training
Goal Setting
Motivation
Sport Psychology Coaching
Overcoming Fear of Flying
Smoking Cessation
Weight Control
Dept for Education Validated Graduate Training Courses for future therapists


TAG offers all of the above and more. Call us on 07973 288988 to find out how we can support you.

values.description:
Rodhus provides individual and co/working space to designer makers. The key objectives of the business are to promote the work of local craft based designer makers, forge links within the local community and create a resource centre for designers as well as the general public. I know that this kind of space is rare in Brighton. 

The idea of building a community of creatives within a shared space is really exciting and the additional support services would make it ideal for someone who wants to start a new business and not be tied in to lengthy rents/leases etc...

The space is now ready for use having been cleared and cleaned up. We already  have a web designer, a furniture designer and a photographer using the space as well as  interest from a broad range of creatives including a  knitwear designer, furniture designer/maker and a printer - which is really encouraging.
values.name: Rodhus Art & Design
